DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to test the effects of a cooking oil blend of dietary fats rich in medium chain triglycerides on energy expenditure and food intake in overweight and obese children.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Dietary Fat Cooking Blend on Energy Expenditure in Children
DOC.criteria: age 1518 body mass index 85% percentile or higher for age/sex weight stable Â±5 lbs weight change in the the 3 months prior use of medications dietary allergies metabolic disorder eating disorder behavioral or psychological disorders
